attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app kept crashing my phone and it wouldn’t let me out of it. Of course i want to support but this app just made matters worse HORRIBLE APP

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: As a (former) trump supporter I was horrified to see just how awful this app was. His following is like a cult and I never want to be associated with him in any way any longer.

attributes.title: BLM🙈✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.review: when I downloaded the app it wouldn’t let me open it. I am very disappointed by this I thought it would be a good app. I was very excited too so just fix it thanks... YALL OMG BLACK LIVES MATTER PERIODTT ✊🏽😊💅🏽💕🥰

attributes.title: disappointed and aroused
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to support our lord, savior, and eternal leader, führer trump, but it kept asking for my credit card information and even after i made a donation, it kept asking for more money. 

the app also took all of my information down, but this i did not mind for our generous overlord. 

however, i was incensed at the lack of loyalty in return. upon making one of my many donations to his campaign, i was guaranteed exclusive access to donny’s onlyfans, but he has not uploaded any nude pictures yet! 

oh, don, why have you forsaken us so?

attributes.title: Giant meteor 2020
attributes.review: This app is so racist, paranoid, and stupid that immediately after I downloaded it, my phone started to accuse my black friends of joining ANTIFA and then left my house to buy a gun.

attributes.title: Just awful.
attributes.review: I expected better from this app. It won’t load or do anything. Do better Trump.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.review: A SCAM to get you to vote for Democrats. I’ve never been so horrified in my life!!! Mostly just propaganda and hate speech!!! It’s terrifying to see the kind of FAKE NEWS being put out there ... sad.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app literally shattered my phone screen. I don’t know how it happen. I open the app and my screen just shattered. Do not recommend

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸
attributes.review:
This app is seriously so convenient! 
Love it so much

attributes.title: Not Fake News! Finally
attributes.review: Facts, News, no lying bias. Great!
